definition: to encircle/to surround/all around/to wear by wrapping around (scarf, shawl)

sentences.english: When the cofferdams are completed and made safe, the water trapped between them is pumped out.
sentences.chinese: 围堰完工稳固后，就将围堰间的水抽干。

sentences.english: When the cofferdams are completed and made safe, the water trapped between them is pumped out.
sentences.chinese: 围堰完工稳固后，就将围堰间的水抽干。

sentences.english: The structure of the longitudinal cofferdam and its foundation of theFeilaixia project in Beijiang River is complicated.
sentences.chinese: 北江飞来峡工程纵向围堰堰体及堰基的组成复杂。

sentences.english: The construction measure of fine silty sand cofferdam is expounded, so as to provide experience for similar engineerings.
sentences.chinese: 阐述粉细砂围堰施工措施，为类似工程提供经验。

sentences.english: The construction diversion of the Tankeng Hydropower Station has the characteristics of big discharge and quick flow speed on its overflow cofferdam.
sentences.chinese: 滩坑水电站施工导流过水围堰流量大，流速快。

sentences.english: It is awful to see the lean hands of dotage making a coffer of the grave.
sentences.chinese: 这是可怕的，看看手中的精益溺爱使围堰严重。

sentences.english: The steel plate boxes were applied in the construction of Heihe municipal water source intake work as cofferdam.
sentences.chinese: 黑河市水源取水口工程围堰施工采用钢板箱围堰型式。

sentences.english: The steel plate boxes were applied in the construction of Heihe municipal water source intake work as cofferdam.
sentences.chinese: 黑河市水源取水口工程围堰施工采用钢板箱围堰型式。

sentences.english: This paper has a detailed description on construction and final results of sand bag cofferdam.
sentences.chinese: 文章详细介绍了砂袋围堰的施工情况和实施效果。

sentences.english: The cofferdam is safe and stable.
sentences.chinese: 目前围堰是稳定安全的。

sentences.english: The workmanship and process flow of the manufacturing of the cofferdams are presented herewith.
sentences.chinese: 介绍钢围堰加工工艺与加工流程。

sentences.english: The construction and design of steel stake cofferdam are introduced at building of bridge and culvert foundation.
sentences.chinese: 介绍桥涵基础施工中钢板桩围堰的设计与施工。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the computational method on jointly discharge of the overtopped cofferdam during construction.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了过水围堰施工导流联合泄流水力计算方法。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a water-retaining cofferdam mode in water and electricity construction.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种水电建设中修建的挡水围堰型式。

sentences.english: It shows that the design of earth rock overflow cofferdam for Tianshengqiao First cascade Hydropower Station is successful.
sentences.chinese: 证明天生桥一级水电站土石过水围堰设计是成功的。

sentences.english: The other part is temporary cofferdam and the rear land-based connection project.
sentences.chinese: 二是临时围堰及后方陆域连接工程。

definition: to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
a low stone wall built along the water's edge to protect an embankment/revetment
earth dam/dam of earth and rocks (as opposed to waterproof dam of clay or concrete)
